author: Dieter Bohn
title: Sprint is dead. Long live Sprint
description: Sprint was never a powerhouse, but it was the un-carrier before T-Mobile. It offered more affordable plans, better smartphone options, and a more inclusive community.
content:
Farewell to the carrier that coulda been a contender
Sprint Flatiron Logo
Its done. We now have just three major cell phone carriers in the US: Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile, which just completed its merger with Sprint. Its been such a long time coming an… [+8872 chars]
